Articles.Content:
Okay, that is fricken cool. http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/26/tech/innovation/asteroid-rings/index.html?hpt=hp_t2

So Chariklo has rings, huh?

So...when are Rings coming to planets, at least, in KSP ?

I kid, I kid (no, I don't, no I don't).

That is still funky and cool though.

Answer to your question: there was some discussion that Gas Planet 2 will have rings however, its still in the concept stage so its probably not going to be released anytime soon. But i heard that GP2's rings are going to be based on the same code which weather will be implemented. If you want planets now, you can get Krag's Planetfactory mod which adds a second gas planet with rings and a cool system of moons(including a moon with rings:cool: ). Also, rings around a small rocky world will be very rare, they will need to be far from the planet and very spread out, otherwise the rings will disperse. But it'll still be a spectacular sight:)
